entry.title: Scammers Are Using AI Phishing and ‘Juice Jacking’ to Target Travelers

entry.title: Solana ETF Proposal Aims to Be First in North America
entry.summary: After Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF approvals in the United States, a firm aims to launch Canada's first Solana ETF. Can the U.S. be far behind?

entry.title: Meet the AI Wingman That Helps Dudes Get Dates
entry.summary: A burgeoning industry teaching men how to talk to women is taking off worldwide. What hath tech wrought?

entry.title: Sorry Dogecoin Fans: Elon Musk’s Twitter Payments Plan Doesn’t Include Crypto
entry.summary: Dogecoin supporter Elon Musk is working toward the launch of a Twitter payments service, but it reportedly doesn’t feature crypto for now.

entry.title: Winklevoss Twins Donate $2 Million in Bitcoin to Trump to Fight Biden's 'War on Crypto'
entry.summary: The Gemini co-founders said they sided with Donald Trump and donated $1 million in Bitcoin apiece to take down President Biden's re-election campaign.

entry.title: LayerZero Airdrop Is Creating Chaos for Polymarket Bettors
entry.summary: LayerZero Labs requiring a donation to receive ZRO tokens left Polymarket with a $680,000 wager disputed by its users.

entry.title: Germany Begins Selling Its Bitcoin Billions, Triggering Volatility Fears

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY

Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats. Jump Crypto gives $10m to crypto PAC. Binance launches HODLer airdrops. TipLink allows SOL transfers by email. ETHFI proposes 50% revenue for buybacks. JTO teases LSD backed stablecoin. JUP team proposes to reduce 30% of supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 140 - MARKETS DOWN BAD

Coinbase to launch pre-market trading. 56% of Fortune 500 building in web3. Uphold to delist USDT in EU due to MiCA. TON flips DOGE in sell-off. Base DEX users now 2nd place after SOL. Ethena launches staking & restaking with Symbiotic. Lens aiming to raise $50m at $500m valuation. Two ‘crazy’ MATIC announcements coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 139 - WHATS THE NEXT META?

Financial advisors not buying BTC yet: BlackRock. Crypto funds saw $600m outflows last week. ZKsync airdrop live, prices at $5bn FDV. ZKsync defend sybil measures. Low float, high FDV coins get hammered again. Tether launches product backed by Gold. Korean exchanges reviewing 600 coins for delisting. ETH ETF ‘sell the rumour, buy the news event’. BTC ETF basis buyers roughly 15% of demand. CVX bounces 100% after loan liquidation. TON sees fastest user growth in crypto history. APT may flip SOL in 1-3 years: Hayes. Crypto lifetime funding eclipses $100bn. SEC claims $876m Ripple fine still fair. Gensler could cost Biden election: Cuban.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 138 - MORE CELEB COINS!

ETH ETFs approvals see little movement, coming 'in the summer’. Stocks continue to hit ATHs as CPI & PPI both come in soft. TON performs best in L1s, active wallets eclipse ETH. Andrew Tate joins celebrity memecoin meta, DADDY hits $350m. SOL DEX volumes eclipse ETH in memecoin frenzy. Curve founder defaults on CRV debt as DeFi coins tumble. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon to pay $4.5bn fine to SEC. BAMK hits $350m in Runes as it issues BTC stablecoin. Gaming tokens face huge sell-off, PRIME changes tokenomics.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 137 - CRYPTO DIPS FURTHER

MicroStrategy to raise $500m to buy BTC. Egorov CRV debt positions begin to liquidate . Circle to support SOL for wallets. 4% of Turkey GDP used to buy stablecoins. QuantMatter say $11m stolen from OKX account. Biden to use Coinbase for crypto donations. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon set to pay $4.5bn fine. Franklin Templeton write report on SOL DePin. China’s ICBC calls ETH ‘digital oil’. Trump wants ‘made in the USA’ BTC. Crypto hacks $19bn since 2011. Symbiotic restaking protocol sees $150m inflows. Polygon launches $720m grants program. ETH ETF issuers still waiting for SEC response. UK ETNs continue to see tiny volume. SOL validators get kicked out for sandwich attacks. ZKsync airdrop happening next week. Phantom & Jito partner for native staking.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 132 - CRYPTO STRENGTH IS GROWING
entry.summary: Crypto consolidates near ATH, $488m ETF inflow. BTC correlation to tech stocks highest since 2023. BTC options anticipate $74-80k move. ETH to $22k by 2030: VanEck. Robinhood to acquire Bitstamp. Coinbase launches Smart Wallet. ByBit opens up explicitly to China users. Global liquidity breaks out to $94T. US President given new powers to block crypto. Cramer & Gensler continue to bash crypto. Gensler hints at prolonged ETH ETF process. Stand with Crypto PAC hits 1m advocates. Turkey denies plans to tax crypto. EigenLayer surpasses $20bn TVL. IONET to launch on Binance.

entry.title: Webinar: Unleashing The Power Of Permissionless Markets With Vega Protocol
entry.summary: Join our expert panel for an insightful discussion on Vega Protocol's revolutionary approach to decentralized derivatives trading. Discover how Vega's permissionless markets enable anyone to create and trade futures and perpetuals on a fully decentralized network. Explore the potential of Vega's innovative features, such as the ability to add new assets, transfer network assets, and adjust network parameters—as well as the protocol's active markets.

Japanese exchange raises $320M to recover funds. ETH ETFs could see $4B inflows in 5 months: K33. Paradigm propose MEV taxes. StarkWare plans ZK scaling for BTC.
